actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, and the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to require pay rate distinctions for different grades, steps, schedules, and levels under statutory pay systems.

summary.text: Directs the President, when making comparability pay adjustments for Government officials and employees, to make additional adjustments for the purpose of maintaining pay distinctions between grades, steps within grades, schedules, and other levels of pay which would exist but for the operation of the statutory requirement limiting the rates of pay of certain positions to the rate of pay for level V of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, and the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to require pay rate distinctions for different grades, steps, schedules, and levels under statutory pay systems.
